issue.title: Log files take an extremely long time to play back

content.raw:
A major bottleneck is the use of XML for log file storage. The whole log file must be parsed first, before it can be used by Gazebo.

We need to change to a lightweight log format, see issue #727.

For the short term, filter a log file before playback:

`gzlog echo state.log -z 30 --filter *.pose/*.pose > state_small.log`
content.html:
A major bottleneck is the use of XML for log file storage. The whole log file must be parsed first, before it can be used by Gazebo.

We need to change to a lightweight log format, see issue #727.

For the short term, filter a log file before playback:

gzlog echo state.log -z 30 --filter *.pose/*.pose > state_small.log
